songs.title: Pose (Eva Shaw Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, yeah
Oh yeah, yeah

[Verse 1]
Stir it up, porridge
Getting dope, so rich
Ah smoke it
And I ain't never liked a broke bitch
I don't never fuck with ya hoe bitch
Quiet down

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh shit
So-oh-oh rich
Eyes low , I'm so loaded
Eyes, pose bitch

[Post-Chorus]
Take it off
Wanna see you work it like oh my god
And that thang is out I know you know
And you bounce it like I know you know
Bitch I know you know

[Drop: Eva Shaw]

[Verse 2]
Bitch I know
All my haters so so broke
Pipe down
All these niggas so so broke
So so broke
Pose bitch
Bitch
Quiet down

[Chorus]
Oh-oh-oh shit
So-oh-oh rich
Eyes low , I'm so loaded
Eyes, pose bitch

[Post-Chorus]
Take it off
Wanna see you work it like oh my god
And that thang is out I know you know
And you bounce it like I know you know
Bitch I know you know

[Drop: Eva Shaw]

[Outro]
All you lame ass bitches is a no go
And if you with it go fuckin' loco, loco
Oh-oh-oh shit
Eyes, pose bitch
